programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: Modest in scale only, this gripping rescue drama reeks of sweat-soaked claustrophobia and suspense. Peter Dawson heads a team of experts, doctors and welders racing against the clock to save a six-year-old boy who's been trapped in a seemingly impregnable bank vault.

programme.title: They Rode West
programme.desc: An Army outpost doctor clashes with his commander when he attempts to treat a band of malaria-stricken Indians.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: Tony and Felix own a tramp boat and run jobs for people in the Caribbean. When they agree to transport the mysterious Irena to another island it drives a wedge between them and Tony swears vengeance against Felix for stealing her. However, Felix has other ideas.

programme.title: Roman Holiday
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by her suffocating schedule, touring European princess Ann takes off for a night while in Rome. When a sedative she took from her doctor kicks in, however, she falls asleep on a park bench and is found by an American reporter, Joe Bradley, who takes her back to his apartment for safety. At work the next morning, Joe finds out Ann's regal identity and bets his editor he can get exclusive interview with her, but romance soon gets in the way.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late-night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: Paul Edgecomb, the head guard of death row, just wants life for him, his colleagues and the condemned to be nice and easy. However, when John Coffee, a massive man convicted of brutally killing a pair of young sisters arrives, things start to get strange. Beyond his simple, naïve nature and a deathly fear of the dark, Coffey seems to possess a prodigious, supernatural gift. Paul begins to question whether Coffey was truly guilty of murdering the two girls.

programme.title: The Last King of Scotland
programme.desc: Idi Amin is the murderous Ugandan dictator of the late 70s and Dr Nicholas Garrigan is a young Scottish doctor. While travelling through Africa, Garrigan almost by chance becomes enlisted as Amin's doctor and confidante. However, as Amin becomes more deranged, Garrigan's close relationship with him endangers not just his own life but those around him.

programme.title: Saraband for Dead Lovers
programme.desc: A star-crossed romance develops between an unhappily married princess and a Swedish nobleman.

programme.title: Storm Over the Nile
programme.desc: A tale of honour, redemption and derring-do set during the British Army's 1898 campaign in Sudan. A disgraced soldier who goes way beyond the call of duty to prove his courage.

programme.title: The Wackiest Ship in the Army
programme.desc: A luckless naval Lieutenant is duped into commanding a dangerous mission into enemy territory during the Bismarck Sea Battle, but his boat is barely shipshape, and his crew turns out to be a bunch of wise-cracking landlubbers.

programme.title: Hangman's Knot
programme.desc: A band of Confederate soldiers capture a large consignment of Yankee gold, then go on the run with their haul when they realise that the war has ended. Although no longer threatened by the Yankees, they soon find themselves under attack from ruthless bandits determined to get their hands on the gold.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an elite 51-year-old assassin who's ready to call it quits after completing his 72nd job. His plans get turned upside down when he becomes the target of a mysterious operative who can seemingly predict his every move. To his horror, Brogan soon learns that the man who's trying to kill him is a younger, faster, cloned version of himself.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: The CIA recruits a lawyer in order to negotiate the immediate release of a captured, and imprisoned U.S. pilot.

programme.title: Mean Streets
programme.desc: A graphic portrayal of life in the underworld of the Little Italy district in New York City. The episodic narrative deals with the experiences and relationships of a petty hoodlum, his epileptic lover and her unstable cousin who is on the run from a loan shark.

programme.title: The Double
programme.desc: An awkward office drone becomes increasingly unhinged after a charismatic and confident look-alike takes a job at his workplace and seduces the woman he desires.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: Kind Hearts and Coronets
programme.desc: When his mother eloped with an Italian opera singer, Louis Mazzini was cut off from her aristocratic family. After the family refuses to let her be buried in the family mausoleum, Louis avenges his mother's death by attempting to murder every family member who stands between himself and the family fortune. But when he finds himself torn between his longtime love and the widow of one of his victims, his plans go awry.

programme.title: San Demetrio, London
programme.desc: Based on a real event, this stirring adaptation of F Tennyson Jesse's official account tells how a group of lowly British Merchant Navy sailors saved the San Demetrio oil tanker after it was almost destroyed by the enemy, braving fire and ocean to sail the vessel 900 miles to the safety of a Scottish port.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: An angry rancher resorts to violence when he learns that his wife has fallen in love with another man.

programme.title: The Iron Petticoat
programme.desc: A humourless Russian, Captain Vinka Kovelenko, defects from her home country. Major Chuck Lockwood is assigned to show her the bright lights of London while she tries to convince him of the superiority of communism. Naturally, the two opposites fall in love but then must contend with the KGB, who are not happy with the idea of one of their officers running around free in London.

programme.title: Turner & Hooch
programme.desc: Detective Scott Turner is an uptight, by-the-book police officer who hopes to leave his sleepy California town and work in the big city. When his friend Amos Reed, the proprietor of a junkyard, is killed, Turner reluctantly inherits the man's dog. Realising that the canine may be able to help him solve the murder case, Turner attempts to adjust to life with the big dog, resulting in much household destruction and unwelcome chaos.

programme.title: Anna
programme.desc: Beneath a Russian woman's striking beauty lies a hidden secret that will unleash her indelible strength and skill and lead to her becoming one of the most feared assassins on the planet.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney is a 13-year-old boy who's being held captive in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims.

programme.title: Berberian Sound Studio
programme.desc: An Englishman is hired to create sound effects for a horror film studio in 1970s Rome, but the job ends up taking a heavy toll on his mental health.

programme.title: Jingle All the Way
programme.desc: Harassed businessman Howard tells his little boy he'll buy him a Turbo Man for Christmas, only to find that every store has sold out. Racing round the shops in search of the last toy, he realises that postman Myron is doing exactly the same thing.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Presenting the latest products live on television that can be ordered directly. The product range extends from vacuum cleaners and bath towels to sports equipment.

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: A four-inch-tall family live beneath the floorboards of a human house. The family's future is threatened when the house falls into the hands of an evil lawyer who plans to destroy it.

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe befriends the animal denizens of an urban jungle when he and Mrs Hoggett embark on a mission to save the farm.

programme.title: A Beautiful Day In The Neighbourhood
programme.desc: Lloyd Vogel is an investigative journalist who receives an assignment to profile Fred Rogers, aka Mr. Rogers. He approaches the interview with skepticism, as he finds it hard to believe that anyone can have such a good nature. But Roger's empathy, kindness and decency soon chips away at Vogel's jaded outlook on life, forcing the reporter to reconcile with his own painful past.

programme.title: Bumblebee
programme.desc: On the run in the year 1987, Bumblebee the Autobot finds refuge in a junkyard in a small California beach town. When 17-year-old Charlie revives him, she quickly learns that this is no ordinary yellow Volkswagen.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: Two European knights of fortune have traveled to China in their search for a magical black powder that can wreak havoc. When they suddenly come under attack by some monstrous figures, they seek refuge.

programme.title: Bone Tomahawk
programme.desc: In the American Old West, a sheriff, his deputy, a gunslinger and a cowboy embark together on a mission to rescue three people from a terrifying group of cannibalistic cave dwellers.

programme.title: In Fear
programme.desc: Driving to a music festival in Ireland, a new couple become lost and are then set upon by a tormentor with an unknown motive.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: SpongeBob goes on a quest to discover a stolen recipe that takes him to our world, where he tangles with a pirate.

programme.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
programme.desc: Denny Swift is a Formula One race car driver who understands that the techniques needed on the racetrack can also be used to successfully navigate everyday life. Besides his career, Denny has three loves of his life -- his beautiful wife, their young daughter and his best friend -- a dog who wants to be reincarnated into a human.

programme.title: River of No Return
programme.desc: Thriller set against the background of the gold rush in the Canadian Rockies. A man jailed for murder falls for the beautiful saloon singer who looked after his son while he was inside. He tries to conceal his criminal past from his son, but that is the least of their problems when the trio are left defenceless against rampaging Indians.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: A romance novelist teams up with an adventurer in a South American jungle to ransom her sister with a legendary jewel.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: Left behind when his family goes away for Christmas vacation, Kevin McCallister enjoys unprecedented freedom of the house and the possessions of his siblings. Using an array of homemade weaponry, he manages to fend off a pair of dim-witted burglars.

programme.title: A Man Called Otto
programme.desc: Otto, a crotchety, irritable, and fiercely strict widower, lives a lonely life, judging everyone he sees. When he forms an unlikely friendship with his new neighbours, Otto begins to change.

programme.title: Military Wives
programme.desc: Following a group of women in England whose partners are away serving in Afghanistan. Faced with the men's absences, they form a choir and quickly find themselves at the centre of a media sensation and global movement. Inspired by global phenomenon of military wives choirs, the story celebrates a band of misfit women who form a choir on a military base.

programme.title: The Future
programme.desc: Sophie and Jason are in their mid-30s, childless and stuck in jobs that were supposed to be `just for now' - she teaches dance to kids, he operates an IT helpdesk from their shared home - but have seemingly set them on a road to nowhere. The realisation that, if they want to make something of their lives, they need to find direction hits with a jolt. One upshot is that they decide to adopt a down-on-its-luck cat.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: Adaptation of the first of J.K. Rowling's popular children's novels about Harry Potter, a boy who learns on his eleventh birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own. He is summoned from his life as an unwanted child to become a student at Hogwarts, an English boarding school for wizards. There, he meets several friends who become his closest allies and help him discover the truth about his parents' mysterious deaths.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potterand his friends, Ron and Hermione, facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry Potter's (Daniel Radcliffe) third year at Hogwarts starts off badly when he learns deranged killer Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban prison and is bent on murdering the teenage wizard. While Hermione's (Emma Watson) cat torments Ron's (Rupert Grint) sickly rat, causing a rift among the trio, a swarm of nasty Dementors is sent to protect the school from Black. A mysterious new teacher helps Harry learn to defend himself, but what is his secret tie to Sirius Black?

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Now in his fifth year at Hogwarts, Harry learns that many in the wizarding community do not know the truth of his encounter with Lord Voldemort. Cornelius Fudge, minister of Magic, appoints his toady, Dolores Umbridge, as Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher, for he fears that professor Dumbledore will take his job. But her teaching is deficient and her methods, cruel, so Harry prepares a group of students to defend the school against a rising tide of evil.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: As Death Eaters wreak havoc in both Muggle and Wizard worlds, Hogwarts is no longer a safe haven for students. Though Harry suspects there are new dangers lurking within the castle walls, Dumbledore is more intent than ever on preparing the young wizard for the final battle with Voldemort. Teenage hormones run rampant through Hogwarts, presenting a different sort of danger. Love may be in the air, but tragedy looms and Hogwarts may never be the same again.

programme.title: Managing Asia
programme.desc: Levi's: CNBC's longest running feature show.

programme.title: Who Owns
programme.desc: Were London's public spaces sold off to private developers.

programme.title: Texas Metal
programme.desc: The team custom builds every part for the first vehicle Ekstensive has ever built entirely from scratch, the heavy-duty, 1,500-horsepower buggy of Bill's dreams. As they finish one enormous build, they take on their next one, John Cena's Bugatti 57C.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Professional off-road racer RJ Anderson enlists Heavy D to trick out his brand new Ford Raptor and add some serious towing capacity; the Diesel Brothers challenge the Goons Garage and Welder Up to a Tuff Truck rematch in Mesquite, Nev.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The Diesel Brothers complete their transformation on an old K5 Blazer and square body truck bed into the ultimate diesel-powered party on wheels; Diesel Dave convinces Heavy D to give his El Camino what it needs to get back on the road.

programme.title: Roadkill Garage
programme.desc: The guys add V-8 power to their 1971 Plymouth Duster, whose seized slant-six had seen better days; with some other repairs, the guys get the Duster back on the road and rescue another vehicle from themselves.

programme.title: Roadkill
programme.desc: Influencers taking on Eric Malone from "Fastest Cars in the Dirty South" in grudge races; Freiburger and Finnegan head in reverse by trading a clean duster for a worse car.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Arnold brings Dan two interlocking projects; he wants FantomWorks to transform his 1946 Ford Panel Wagon into a classic tour-mobile, and he also wants Dan to fix the 1941 Harley Flathead motorcycle that will ride in the back.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: Dan faces an uphill battle as he tackles a 1968 Ford Mustang California Special that is riddled with rust; Dan cannot locate the parts needed to restore a 1970 Opel Kadett.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: When a beat up Chevy short bed rolls into the yard, Andy thinks it's too valuable to crush, but Bobby isn't pleased about Andy's idea.

programme.title: Garage Squad
programme.desc: After suffering a terrible tragedy, a family is eager to get their Chevy 1976 4x4 outside and into the mud; can the Squad get this gem back on the road?

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Fresh off their win at Roadkill Nights, Alex and Lucky take on double the cars for double the seat time; a Coyote-swapped 04 Mustang and a leaking but eager 74 Javelin track screamer are just barely on the list.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Graduation day is approaching and everyone, especially Adam, is ready - except for Beverly who is not coping well with the idea of an empty nest. Meanwhile, with Geoff's encouragement, Erica decides to try out for Cyndi Lauper as a one-time backup singer replacement. Ultimately, resurrecting her singing dreams doesn't manifest, but bigger and exciting new beginnings await her and the Goldbergs.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: After 15 years in African bush country, Cady knows all about herd instincts, but nothing has prepared her for high school. She joins a popular but cruelly manipulative crowd of girls known as the `Plastics' and secretly mocks them, but the fun stops when one betrays her and steals the boy she fancies.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friend's killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: We're the Millers
programme.desc: Small-time pot dealer David learns the hard way that no good deed goes unpunished. Trying to help some teenagers, he is jumped by thugs and loses his cash and stash. Now David's in big debt to his supplier, and to wipe the slate clean, he must go to Mexico to pick up the guy's latest shipment. To accomplish his mission, Dave devises a foolproof plan: he packs a fake family into a huge RV and heads south of the border for a wild weekend that is sure to end with a bang.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friend's wedding in Singapore. She's also surprised to learn that Nick's family is extremely wealthy and he's considered one of the country's most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nick's disapproving mother.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters who have attacked New York.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and he'll finally get to be the rock star he knows he's destined to be.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon can't let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop from the original film returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unravelling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: An unconventional sleuth attempts to find a football team's stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps

Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III

programme.title: Pixels

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A girl who's sick of the social strictures of junior high is transformed into a grownup overnight. In this feel-good fairy tale, teenager Jenna wants a boyfriend, and when she's unable to find one, she fantasizes about being a well-adjusted adult. Suddenly, her secret desire becomes a reality, and she is transformed into a 30-year-old. However, adulthood, with its own set of male-female challenges, isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: When the transition is being made from silent films to `talkies', everyone has trouble adapting. Don and Lina have been cast repeatedly as a romantic couple, but when their latest film is remade into a musical, only Don has the voice for the new singing part. After a lot of practise with a diction coach, Lina still sounds terrible, and Kathy, a bright young aspiring actress, is hired to record over her voice.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still John's constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, John's girlfriend. Though Lori's displeasure is exacerbated by the pair's constant consumption of beer and weed, she's not the one who's most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of John's boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys'. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each other's throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Pixels

programme.title: You've Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistler's Mother' painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Happy Gilmore
programme.desc: Happy Gilmore is a bad boy ice hockey player who fails to make the grade because he can't skate or control his temper, but he does have a powerful shot and realises he can hit a golf ball 400 yards. When his gran's house is repossessed because she never paid tax, he agrees to take up golf to try and win enough money to buy it back, but he can't putt and the golfing establishment aren't happy to have him around.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: The world is struck by inexplicable phenomena - Rome's Colosseum explodes, London's pigeons go berserk - until it becomes apparent that the planet's core has stopped moving, causing electro-magnetic mayhem. The only hope lies in a crack team of scientists burrowing to the core and re-starting earth's engine, but is the disaster natural or is there a more sinister explanation?

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Ford Brody, a Navy bomb expert, has just reunited with his family in San Francisco, only to be forced to go to Japan to help his estranged father, Joe. Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake as they make their way towards their final battleground back in San Francisco.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Aliens arrive on Earth with plans to steal Earth's resources, and when a confrontation with the invaders knocks out the Navy's radar capability, American and Japanese forces must work together to find a way to save the planet.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.desc: An astronaut struggles to maintain his grip on reality during a possibly fatally compromised mission to Saturn's moon, Titan.

programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid A.I.'s attempt at winning a grieving widow's heart puts it in the path of a government agent trying to stop the rise of machine consciousness.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it.

programme.title: Riddick
programme.desc: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, wanted criminal Riddick must confront two teams of mercenaries, one of whom is led by a man from his past.

programme.title: Passengers

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: After a massive earthquake, only one apartment building is left standing in Seoul, South Korea. Survivors flock to Hwang Gung Apartments, but residents cannot cope with the increasing numbers.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Simulant
programme.desc: A humanoid A.I.'s attempt at winning a grieving widow's heart puts it in the path of a government agent trying to stop the rise of machine consciousness.

programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts debate whether they would be better off spending their remaining days as friends or something more.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: Live Die Repeat: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: A soldier who was killed in action gets caught up in a time loop, in which he repeatedly relives his last battle. However, the more times he fights, the closer he gets to discovering how to defeat the alien enemy.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In the late 21st century, a factory worker visits a company that implants fake memories. However, after his procedure he struggles to tell real and fabricated thoughts apart.

Earth's billions of inhabitants are unaware that the planet has an expiration date. With the warnings of an American scientist, world leaders begin secret preparations for the survival of select members of society. When the global cataclysm finally occurs, failed writer Jackson Curtis tries to lead his family to safety as the world starts falling apart.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A group of misguided animal rights activists free a caged chimp infected with the 'Rage' virus from a medical research lab. When London bike courier Jim wakes up from a coma a month after, he finds his city all but deserted. On the run from the zombie-like victims of the Rage, Jim stumbles upon a group of survivors, including Selena and cab driver Frank, and joins them on a perilous journey to what he hopes will be safety.

programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In 2041 central Europe, Detective Em investigates the case of a murdered couple where a restoration team brings one of them back to life.

programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

programme.title: Omni Loop
programme.desc: A quantum physicist finds herself stuck in a time loop with a black hole growing in her chest and only a week to live. When she meets a gifted student they team up to save her life and unlock the mysteries of time travel.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Voyagers
programme.desc: Set in the near future, the film chronicles the odyssey of 30 young men and women who are sent deep into space on a multi-generational mission in search of a new home. The mission descends into madness, as the crew reverts to its most primal state, not knowing if the real threat they face is what's outside the ship or who they're becoming inside it.

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: A manic Johannesburg is policed by an army of android cops. The robots' inventor secretly works on a prototype officer which can feel and think for itself but it is stolen and forced into a life of crime when stolen by crooks.

Earth's billions of inhabitants are unaware that the planet has an expiration date. With the warnings of an American scientist, world leaders begin secret preparations for the survival of select members of society. When the global cataclysm finally occurs, failed writer Jackson Curtis tries to lead his family to safety as the world starts falling apart.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A group of scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal them. Only one man survives. He has two aims: to find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: David Dutton is the sheriff of picture-perfect American town Ogden Marsh. One night and out of the blue one of its citizens shows up during a baseball game with a shot-gun and ready to kill. This is the beginning of a spiral of violence and mayhem.

programme.title: Resident Evil
programme.desc: An amnesiac called Alice leads a team of commandos into the multi-national Umbrella Corporation's locked-down bunker, which is controlled by the main computer, The Red Queen. The unit is sealed because of a virus that gassed all the staff but, as Alice and her team discover, the virus has re-animated them.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Gun-toting heroine Alice goes above ground to rid Raccoon City of a second plague of zombies, but the evil Umbrella Corporation and the military have a new secret weapon. With her allies, fellow survivors Jill Valentine, Carlos Oliviera and his Captain, Nicholai, she must battle a new and improved Matt Addison, code name: Nemesis.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owner's payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.desc: A businessman gives up land his father willed to a black sharecropper, raising tensions in Sparta. Written by Denise Nicholas.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Mobsters buying land near Sparta try to drive Gillespie's daughter from her home; guest Burgess Meredith.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take -- small-time drug lords -- sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill --- for police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Exit Wounds
programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars as maverick Detroit police detective Orin Boyd, whose take-no-prisoners approach to domestic terrorism gets him booted downtown to the city's toughest precinct. Multi-Platinum hip hop star DMX stars as the powerful and mysterious crime lord Latrell Walker, whose dicey connections and seemingly unlimited cash make him everyone's target. Together the two men take on a conspiracy that reaches all the way through the ranks to the heart of the precinct.

programme.title: Most Wanted
programme.desc: U.S. Sgt. Dunn (Keenen Ivory Wayans) is sentenced to death for a crime he didn't commit, but he gets a second chance when Lt. Col. Grant Casey (Jon Voight) handpicks him for a dangerous secret mission. Unfortunately, Dunn soon finds out that his assignment is a setup, and he is framed for the murder of the president's wife. Dunn goes on the run from the law with Dr. Constantini (Jill Hennessy), who knows the true identity of the assassin. But Casey will do anything to silence the pair.

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: A heroic loner takes on a group of nuclear terrorists in this seagoing tale. Posing as a rock band, the terrorists get themselves hired for a party aboard the USS Missouri, a battleship en route to Pearl Harbor for decommissioning. They plan to steal the ship's nuclear arsenal but haven't reckoned on the intervention of the ship's chef, a decorated former Navy SEAL.

programme.title: Under Siege 2: Dark Territory
programme.desc: Former U.S. Navy SEAL Casey Ryback (Steven Seagal) has left the armed forces to lead a quiet life as a chef in Denver. While taking time off from his new job, Ryback decides to go on a scenic train trip with his niece Sarah (Katherine Heigl). When the arrival of evil genius Travis Dane (Eric Bogosian) and an international team of hijackers interrupts their relaxing journey through the majestic Rocky Mountains, Ryback must get involved and save the day.

programme.title: Someone They Knew with Tamron Hall
programme.desc: Terri Gilbert said she didn't know who was coming down the basement steps; she shot and killed him; turned out to be her husband whom she was divorcing; twenty years earlier, she told a similar story, about her first husband.

programme.title: Family Feud Favorites
programme.desc: "Family Feud" has seen some crazy moments over the years, so buckle up as we revisit these fan favorites.

programme.desc: A woman fell for and married the cable man, but now a cyber security expert and a polygraph examiner team up to discover if he is cheating.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: A Michigan woman undergoes questioning by a former expert military interrogator to prove she's been faithful to her boyfriend.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: A dog trainer is in the dog house after her boyfriend of two years finds condoms in her purse.

programme.title: Couples Court With the Cutlers
programme.desc: A woman questions her boyfriend's fidelity after finding scandalous photos of him with half-naked women while he was on an international tour.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: A Kentucky woman brings her ex-boyfriend to court to prove that he is the father of her 29-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: Tired of her ex-boyfriend dodging child support, the mother of a 3-year-old child brings her ex-boyfriend to court to prove that he is the biological father of her son.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: There's drama in the courtroom when a Georgia woman faces a former friend who claims her son fathered her 3-month-old baby.

programme.title: Lauren Lake's Paternity Court
programme.desc: A heartbroken Texas man brings his current girlfriend to court to finally put his doubts to rest about the paternity of her 3-month-old baby boy.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Gillespie discovers a major New Orleans mob real estate scam is behind the scheme to force his daughter from her home and acquire her land.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Harriet consults Gillespie after she reluctantly agrees to help her son get his imprisoned father's murder conviction reversed.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: After threatening two boys (John Aaron Bennett, Zach McLemore) who trespassed on his property, a dangerous man (Jason Byce) is shot dead in his home. With Carroll O'Connor.

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Far from Chicago, hairdresser Gina Norris has relocated to Atlanta with her daughter and has quickly established herself as a rare talent in her profession. But after repeatedly butting heads with her shady, over-the-top boss, Jorge, Norris sets out to create her own salon -- even snagging a few of Jorge's employees and clients, including Lynn and Terri, respectively. Now, Jorge will do anything to shut her down.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Daddy's Little Girls
programme.desc: Monty (Idris Elba), a mechanic, struggles to make ends meet and raise his three young daughters alone. When his drug-dealing ex-wife wins custody of the girls in court, he enlists the help of Julia (Gabrielle Union), a successful attorney, to get the girls back. Romance unexpectedly blooms between the pair, but the couple must come to terms with their very different lives and find a way to keep Monty's family together.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea Goes to Jail
programme.desc: After a high-speed car chase, Madea (Tyler Perry) winds up behind bars because her quick temper gets the best of her. Meanwhile, Assistant District Attorney Josh Hardaway (Derek Luke) lands a case that's too personal to handle: that of a young prostitute and former drug addict named Candace (Keshia Knight Pulliam). When Candace winds up in jail, Madea takes the young woman under her protective wing.

programme.title: Next Day Air
programme.desc: Delivery man Leo Jackson (Donald Faison) is definitely on the wrong road to success. He still lives at home, he and his girlfriend just broke up, and he has multiple complaints stacked against him at work. Fortunately, Leo has plenty of marijuana to keep his mind off his troubles. But when he accidentally delivers a box of cocaine to the wrong address, Leo finds himself in the middle of a bad deal that may just cost him his life.

programme.title: A Thin Line Between Love and Hate
programme.desc: Ladies' man Darnell Wright (Martin Lawrence) is used to getting his way with women. Although he is committed to marrying his longtime love, Mia (Regina King), he can't help himself when he meets the beautiful and standoffish Brandi (Lynn Whitfield). After bedding and then trying to ditch Brandi, Darnell is in for an unpleasant surprise: the unhinged Brandi is not about to let Darnell dump her, and she will do anything to exact revenge on him for tossing her aside.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show
programme.desc: When heartburn sends him to the emergency room, Bernie resolves to beat his age by acting like he did in his youth.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show
programme.desc: After an intruder breaks into the house, Bernie reacts by turning it into a high-security compound, driving everyone crazy with his overprotectiveness.

programme.title: Beyond the Lights
programme.desc: Though she's been groomed for stardom all her life by an overbearing mother (Minnie Driver), singer Noni (Gugu Mbatha-Raw) is having trouble dealing with her success. Feeling unable to cope any longer, Noni tries to kill herself, but luckily Kaz (Nate Parker), the police officer assigned to be her bodyguard, thwarts her suicide attempt. Noni and Kaz feel an instant attraction, but those in their orbit oppose the romance for fear the pair will stray from the course planned out for both of them.

programme.title: Needle in a Timestack
programme.desc: Nick and Janine live in bliss until her ex warps time to try to tear them apart by using Nick's old girlfriend. As Nick's memories and reality disappear, he must decide what he's willing to sacrifice to save -- or let go of -- everything he loves.

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: After he discovers events from his past are repeating, Donovan (Danny Glover) is convinced his young neighbor and her mother will die on the same day his wife and daughter were killed 30 years ago.

programme.title: Chloe & Theo
programme.desc: Chloe, a young woman who has been searching for something to believe in, is living on the streets of New York City. She comes face to face with an Inuit Eskimo named Theo, who was sent By his elders to send a message to humankind.

programme.title: Dreamin' Wild
programme.desc: What if a childhood dream suddenly came true - but thirty years later? That's what happened to singer/songwriter Donnie Emerson. His dream of success suddenly - and unexpectedly - came true but only as he approached 50 years old.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Orphaned during the Sudanese Civil War, a group of young refugees are given the opportunity to leave their camp and resettle in America.

programme.title: The Buddy Holly Story
programme.desc: Buddy Holly laid the foundations for a generation of popular music with his ground-breaking combination of country music and rhythm & blues.

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: A life affirming story of sisterhood, love and loss. Two sisters travel across Europe to find themselves.

programme.title: Louder Than Words
programme.desc: After the unexpected death of their daughter, a couple work to build a state of the art children's hospital where families are welcomed into the healing process.

programme.title: Mother and Child
programme.desc: Naomi Watts, Annette Bening , Kerry Washington, Jimmy Smits and Samuel L. Jackson star in a moving story of three women and the power of the unbreakable bond between mother and child.

programme.title: We Have Always Lived in the Castle
programme.desc: A twisted mystery based on the acclaimed novel by Shirley Jackson ('The Haunting of Hill House'). Merricat (Taissa Farmiga - 'The Nun') lives with her sister Constance (Alexandra Daddario - 'Baywatch') and her Uncle Julian (Crispin Glover - 'Back to the Future').

programme.title: The Last Full Measure
programme.desc: Thirty four years after his death, Airman William H. Pitsenbarger, Jr. Pits is awarded the nations highest military honor, for his actions on the battlefield.

programme.title: Skin
programme.desc: A black child born to white parents is cast out of white society in 1950s South Africa. The film follows her thirty-year journey to acceptance.

programme.title: Magic Beyond Words
programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.

programme.title: The Journey
programme.desc: After 40 years of "The Troubles" in Northern Ireland the leading players meet at St. Andrews to try and hammer out a final and lasting peace agreement.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: I Am Not Your Negro
programme.desc: Told entirely in the words of James Baldwin, through both personal appearances and the text of his final unfinished book project, I Am Not Your Negro touches on the lives and assassinations of Malcolm X, Martin Luther King Jr.

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: In the future, a man with access to people's memories finds his life at risk when he discovers a dark secret.

programme.title: Winter Ridge
programme.desc: A young detective is torn apart after his wife ends up in a coma. Unable to accept her condition, he throws himself into a manhunt chasing a serial killer whose motives are connected to his wife.

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: In a land where beauty is preserved by the innocence of those who live there, two young people become entangled in the ongoing battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: The far-flung members of the Rodriguez family converge at their parents' home to face what may be their last Christmas together in this heart-warming holiday comedy.

programme.title: Borrego
programme.desc: A young botanist (Lucy Hale) is kidnapped by an inexperienced drug mule and must fight to survive the desert while being hunted by the cartel.

programme.title: Into The Blue 2: The Reef
programme.desc: Free-spirited scuba divers Sebastion and Dani run a modest diving company in Hawaii. The young couple is delighted when they're hired by mysterious jet-setters who are searching for sunken treasure and will pay big money for diving help.

programme.title: How It Ends
programme.desc: In this feel-good apocalyptic comedy, Liza (Zoe Lister-Jones) embarks on a hilarious journey through LA in hopes of making it to her last party before it all ends, running into an eclectic cast of characters along the way.

programme.title: Goats
programme.desc: Fourteen-year-old Ellis is getting ready to leave his luxurious home in the foothills of Tucson for his freshman year at Gates Academy, an East Coast prep school. This means leaving behind Wendy, his flaky, new age mother and the only real father he has ever known, Goat Man.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: Set in New Orleans, this is the story of a mysterious man, Nick Easter. Nick gets himself not only on the jury of a landmark case against a gun manufacturer, but as the foreman, in an attempt to influence the other jury members to vote a certain way.

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: Two strangers who drunkenly got married in Vegas fight over a huge jackpot after having their annulment denied by a judge.

programme.title: Legend

programme.title: Cage of Gold
programme.desc: Judith is dining with Alan, a young doctor, when a note is brought to her from Bill, a friend of her schoolgirl days. Alan proposes to Judith, begging her not to become entangled with Bill, but she rejects his proposal. She is swept into a whirlwind romance with Bill and marries him

programme.title: Dr. Crippen
programme.desc: On trial for the murder of his wife Belle, Dr. Crippen recalls their life in north London: her affairs with other men, the way she treated him little better than a servant, their reconciliations, her insistent and abhorrent sexual claims on him.

programme.title: THE SECRET PLACE
programme.desc: When a temperamental opera star finds out her husband is accused of murder she sets off to find the real killer and is determined to prove her husbands innocence. As she comes closer to the truth, she also comes closer to danger.

programme.title: Pink String and Sealing Wax
programme.desc: In 1890's Brighton, the young son of a puritanical chemist longs to escape the repressive environment of his family life and the overbearing restraints of his cruel, pious father. Eventually finding refuge in a local tavern, he is immediately attracted to the sordid glamour of the drinking classes and the gritty world that they inhabit. He also finds himself becoming infatuated with the tavern's landlady, which will inadvertently lead to him being drawn into a plot to kill her abusive husband. Directed by Robert Hamer (Kind Hearts and Coronets, School For Scoundrels), Pink String and Sealing Wax stars Googie Withers (The Lady Vanishes), Mervyn Johns (Dead of Night) and Gordon Jackson (Whisky Galore! / The Quatermass Experiment) in a film that cleverly entwines the dynamics of a thriller with biting social commentary and a multi-layered plot structure that contrasts the parallels of the British class system.

programme.title: DAYBREAK
programme.desc: Eddie is a man with a secret - his second job is that of public hangman. When he falls into the canal following a fight with a youth over his wife, his body is not found. A thriller with unexpected twists.

programme.title: The Ghost Goes West
programme.desc: Robert Donat plays two roles in this celebrated comedy.

programme.title: Proud Valley

programme.title: Passport to Shame
programme.desc: When the innocent-faced Malou, having been framed with a crime in Paris, arrives at a sordid brothel in England, it seems that she is condemned to a miserable and soul-destroying life...

programme.title: Find the Lady
programme.desc: When a pretty model spends New Year's Eve investigating the disappearance of her grandmother she is drawn into a sinister web of theft, kidnapping and, finally, murder.

programme.title: Circus of Fear

programme.title: Death Line

programme.title: Homicide: Life on the Street
programme.desc: It is a quiet night, and the squad passes the time watching a documentary about their lives and work.

Artemis and her loyal soldiers are transported from our world to the new one, the unflappable lieutenant receives the shock of her life. In a desperate battle for survival against enormous enemies with incredible powers and unstoppable, terrifying attacks, Artemis teams up with a mysterious hunter who has found a way to fight back.

programme.title: Spiral: From the Book of Saw
programme.desc: Working in the shadow of his father, Detective Ezekiel "Zeke" Banks and his rookie partner take charge of an investigation into grisly murders that are eerily reminiscent of the city's gruesome past. Unwittingly entrapped in a deepening mystery, Zeke finds himself at the center of the killer's morbid game.

programme.title: Insidious: The Red Door
programme.desc: Josh Lambert heads east to drop his son, Dalton, off at school. However, Dalton's college dream soon becomes a living nightmare when the repressed demons of his past suddenly return to haunt them both.

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: Everything that farmer Graham Hess (Mel Gibson) assumed about the world is changed when he discovers a message - an intricate pattern of circles and lines - carved into his crops. As he investigates the unfolding mystery, what he finds will forever alter the lives of his brother (Joaquin Phoenix) and children (Rory Culkin), (Abigail Breslin). A unique story that explores the mysterious real-life phenomena of crop signs and the effects they have on one man and his family.

programme.title: The Happening
programme.desc: An apocalyptic threat to humanity arrives out of the clear blue sky with a series of violent, inexplicable deaths spreading across the country. The cause of the terrifying phenomenon remains unknown, prompting science teacher Elliot Moore (Mark Wahlberg), his wife Alma (Zooey Deschanel) and his colleague Julian (John Leguizamo) to try to elude the invisible killer in Pennsylvania's farmland. Soon it becomes clear that no one is safe.

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Young Cole Sear (Haley Joel Osment) is haunted by a dark secret: he is visited by ghosts. Cole is frightened by visitations from those with unresolved problems who appear from the shadows. He is too afraid to tell anyone about his anguish, except child psychologist Dr. Malcolm Crowe (Bruce Willis). As Dr. Crowe tries to uncover the truth about Cole's supernatural abilities, the consequences for client and therapist are a jolt that awakens them both to something unexplainable.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: It's been 40 years since Laurie Strode survived a vicious attack from crazed killer Michael Myers on Halloween night. Locked up in an institution, Myers manages to escape when his bus transfer goes horribly wrong. Laurie now faces a terrifying showdown when the masked madman returns to Haddonfield, Ill. -- but this time, she's ready for him.

The miniature hero must use his new skills to prevent Cross, also known as Yellowjacket, from perfecting the same technology and using it as a weapon for evil.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: In this weekly program, Dr. David Jeremiah delivers practical messages to the congregation at the Shadow Mountain Community Church in San Diego. Also featured is music from the Shadow Mountain Community Church Choir and Orchestra, as well as performances by musical guests that have included Steve Green and Charles Billingsley. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.title: Creflo Dollar
programme.desc: Dr. Creflo Dollar ministers to people from all backgrounds with hopes for change; Creflo helps viewers find ways to renew their faith, mind, and spirit; based on the belief that the Bible is the written and inspired Word of God, the show is meant to invoke change in the lives of people across the globe; Creflo and his wife, Taffi, share their vision for everyone to hear the Word and gain understanding of God's love and promises.

programme.title: Life Today With James Robison
programme.desc: James Robison is a former preacher who changed directions in his life several years ago and began hosting this television show alongside his wife, Betty, in order to reach out to help more people. This daily religious and self-help program welcomes guests who tell how they have successfully overcome difficulties in their lives by following God's word -- with the hope of encouraging others to do the same and look to God for help and guidance in times of need. The Robisons provide viewers with Bible-based advice to help them deal with everyday problems.
