programme.title: Snapshot Of Love
programme.desc: Adrian is a Hollywood paparazzi assigned to get photos of a very elusive star, Parker Bennett. Little does she know, she'll get her chance when they both end up at the same BnB in the mountains of NC.

programme.title: The Smurfiest Of Friends
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf had one friend: Clumsy Smurf. But poor Clumsy is so, well, clumsy, that Brainy refuses to see him again. So now he is left without anyone willing to listen to him. Maybe Buddy, the good-looking imp met by chance near the Great Oak can be a pal for Brainy....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - It's A Puppy's Life: The evil wizard Gargamel has got hold of magical ectoplasmic crystal eggs that will enable him to change bodies with Papa Smurf. What better plan could there be? Disguised as Papa Smurf, he's going to lead all the Smurfs to his cauldron! But as fate would have it, Gargamel is changed into Puppy, the Smurf doggie...

programme.title: A Gift For Papa's Day
programme.desc: Gargamel steals Papa Smurf's birthday hat to lure the Smurfs into a trap. Papa tricks Gargamel into releasing them and then keeps the unusual hat to remind everyone of their great escape.

programme.title: The Purple Smurfs
programme.desc: The purple fly bites Lazy and an epidemic starts that turns the little villagers into angry, purple Smurfs. Papa Smurf discovers that the pollen from a tuberose flower is an antidote and soon things are smurfy again.

programme.title: Reckless Smurfs
programme.desc: This time, Gargamel's plan cannot fail. Undeterred by Azrael's derisive cackling, the evil wizard perfects a magic substance called Daredevil Dust, which is going to change all the Smurfs into rash, incautious swashbucklers. Will Papa Smurf fall into Gargamel's trap? Will their enemy catch all the Smurfs? Will this story have a happy ending?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfstone Quest: In the distant valley of Nodrog, the Smurfs meet the Molians who try to dissuade them from obtaining the magical Smurf-stone that Papa Smurf needs to cure his gout.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Mere Truffle: The Smurfs love truffles but truffles belong to the Trolls and the Trolls live under Truffle Troll Mountain, where in the shadows of the lake lurks the Thing with No Name...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Christmas: The wonderful joy of Christmas for Baby Smurf and everyone else is almost ruined by the evil Chlorhydris who puts a spell on Mr. Nicholas to stop him from spreading holiday cheer. Fortunately, Papa Smurf and his little blue creatures break the spell and Christmas spreads over the land once more.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Never Smurf Off Till Tomorrow: A fierce wind carries the Smurfs' windmill away, with several Smurfs inside. Is Lazy Smurf really at fault or is an injustice being committed? Are the captive Smurfs going to be saved from the volcano's crater? Is Brainy going to smurf up his mouth for a moment?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy And The Porridge Pot: The good fairy, Guinilda gives Greedy a magic porridge pot that Brainy causes to overflow into the village and forest. The good-hearted fairy hurries to the rescue and then asks for the pot back to give to an orphanage of hungry children.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Happy Unhappiness Day To You: On Unhappiness Day, The Smurfs must be unhappy to appreciate their happiness during the rest of the year. Gargamel invents a happiness-detector to find the Smurfs, but uses it on the one day when the Smurfs are not happy. Instead, he locates a couple of happy dragons and incurs their wrath.

programme.title: Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
programme.desc: Once a year, Greedy Smurf makes a special batch of Smurfberry candy. Every Smurf receives a whole year's provision of the smurfiest candy in the whole world. But can a Smurf keep his provision for a whole year? Can the Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - One Good Smurf Deserves Another: Handy Smurf has saved Clumsy from a horrible fate. Clumsy swears eternal devotion to his savior and does his best to repay his debt… With awkward results. A clever scheme is needed to stop Clumsy's well-meant catastrophes...

programme.title: Return To Don Smurfo
programme.desc: When a drop of Papa Smurf's new potion spills on the Smurflings' adventure book, the fictional hero springs to life. The dashing Don Smurfo, willing to rid the Smurf of the evil Gargamel, gallantly captures him...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Circus For Baby: It must be a coincidence: just as an elephant crosses the forest and meets baby Smurf, the Smurfs decide to create a big Smurf Circus. They are going to meet the infernal sorcerer Balthazar and Baby Smurf will have a lot of fun...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Giant: Simon is lost in the forest and in search of his parents. Simon is the son of a couple of giants. The Smurfs try to bring him home, but then Gargamel interrupts the party.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Little Orange Horse With Gold Shoes: Sliding down a rainbow, a little winged horse loses a golden shoe. He meets the Smurfette and she helps him look for his lost horseshoe. They fall in love somehow, for who could be unmoved by the charm of a little orange horse... Or of a Smurfette?

programme.title: Return To Don Smurfo
programme.desc: When a drop of Papa Smurf's new potion spills on the Smurflings' adventure book, the fictional hero springs to life. The dashing Don Smurfo, willing to rid the Smurf of the evil Gargamel, gallantly captures him...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's Enchanted Didey: When Gargamel is able to make a flying carpet out of a patchwork quilt, accidents are bound to happen...The result of one accident is that a piece of the flying bedspread is used as Baby Smurf's diaper, with very surprising results...

programme.title: The Mr Smurf Contest
programme.desc: When Papa decides to throw a Harvest Moon ball, all the male Smurfs compete in a "Mr Smurf" contest for the honor of escorting Sassette. Gargamel sneaks into the contest after shrinking himself with blue dye, in the hope of capturing all the Smurfs when he returns to normal size. The Smurfs kick him out and Sassette lets Papa escort her.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Puppy: Homnibus gives the Smurfs a dog that they name Puppy. The playful, normal-sized animal likes his new home, but Balthazar captures him, thinking that the Smurfs' magical secrets are in Puppy's collar. The Smurfs rescue the dog and Baby finds only music in the collar's locket.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lure Of The Orb: Allura the Enchantress possesses a very special magic orb whose energy, as she says, can lift spirits and inspire the uninspired! All you have to do is hold the orb between your hands... It is true the orb bestows inspiration, up to a point. But its side effects can be very dangerous, as the Smurfs find out when they become addicted to it...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All's Smurfy That Ends Smurfy: Gargamel's theft of the Fairies' gold almost brings a state of war between the Fairies and the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Kow-Tow, We Won't Bow: Smurfette leads the Smurflings on a nature hike, but Puppy gets too far ahead and they chase him into the land of the Wartmongers. King Bullrush captures them in bubbles and imprisons them. A group of rebels rescue the Smurflings and they escape on the back of Puppy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sand Witch: A swamp monster kidnaps Baby as a gift for a witch. The witch, who thinks no one loves her, is amazed when Baby shows affection. When Papa comes to rescue Baby, he makes the witch understand that the loyal swamp monster has always loved her.

programme.title: The Magic Earrings
programme.desc: Hogatha manages to obtain the magic golden earrings of Sonoria that will enable her to hear Smurfy voices from afar. Following Lazy's snores, she almost reaches the Smurf Village until Harmony's horn-blasts blow in her earrings and she flies home in a rage.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Love Those Smurfs: A wicked sorceress casts a spell on the Smurfs, forcing them to love themselves and not each other. Vanity, who's always like that, was away at the time, but notices the change when he returns. He breaks the spell by getting all the Smurfs to eat humble pie baked by a wizard.

programme.title: Beauty Is Only Smurf Deep
programme.desc: Periwinkle, a vain Pixie, is upset when her magic mirror tells her that Vanity is the fairest, not she. Periwinkle kidnaps Vanity, but the rest of the Smurfs come to Vanity's rescue. Periwinkle sees the error of her ways and they become friends.

programme.title: All Creatures Great And Smurf
programme.desc: Nat Smurf is convinced he can help all creatures with his healing ways, even the wicked Azrael after he gets his paw caught in a trap. He heals well, but even though he is tempted to stay with the Smurfs, he runs back to Gargamel while leading his old master away from Smurf Village.

programme.title: Gargamel's Mis-Fortune
programme.desc: Gargamel, the evil but incompetent wizard, tries to trick Esmeralda, the gypsy, into giving him a formula to catch the Smurfs. Of course the gypsy proves to be much smarter than Gargamel, and the Smurfs even more so.

programme.title: Poet's Writers' Block
programme.desc: The Smurfs want a poem written for each of them. The pressure overwhelms Poet, so he runs away seeking inspiration. The Wilybeast King captures Poet and forces him to write a poem to cheer up the King's daughter. Poet learns that motivation must come from the heart and cannot be forced.

programme.title: Smurfette's Sweet Tooth
programme.desc: Once a year, Greedy Smurf makes a special batch of Smurfberry candy. Every Smurf receives a whole year's provision of the smurfiest candy in the whole world. But can a Smurf keep his provision for a whole year? Can the Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Dark-Ness Monster: When Brainy loses his glasses, he drops things, runs into objects, and becomes just as helpless as Clumsy, who now has to read to Brainy and help him get around. This experience makes Brainy feel guilty for the way he always made fun of Clumsy. He treats him with more respect once he receives a new pair of glasses.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tis The Season To Be Smurfy: This is Wild Smurf's first Christmas, and he's impressed by the decorations in the Village of the Smurfs. But Grandpa and Sassette are going to teach him the real meaning of Christmas when they help an old couple to live the most beautiful Christmas they've ever seen...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Poet And Painter: Because they feel unappreciated, Poet and Painter leave Smurf Village and head for Storm Island, totally unaware that Gargamel is planning to trap them. Papa Smurf and his faithful volunteers rescue their friends.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa's Puppy Prescription: Gargamel conjures a spell that makes Puppy think he's a cat. Papa receives a prescription from Homnibus to reverse the spell and all the Smurfs help. As Puppy becomes a dog again, Gargamel gets too close and he becomes a cat.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Winged Wizard: Determined to fly over Smurf village to catch a Smurf to take to the Wizard's Convention, Gargamel invokes his Book of Spells to help him. A series of funny flying machine mishaps occur and Gargamel is once more the laughing stock of the Wizard's Convention.

programme.title: The Last Whippoorwill
programme.desc: There are poachers in the Duke of Bedford's forest. They almost succeed in catching the Whippoorwill that lives there... But worse than that, the Duke's son, Chauncey, finds the bird's egg and takes it to the castle for his collection. The Whippoorwill is not doing its insect-eating job anymore, and gnats, mosquitoes, bugs of every type abound. Can the Smurfs restore the Whippoorwill's egg to be nest?

programme.title: They'Re Smurfing Our Song
programme.desc: Gargamel casts a spell on Woody's magical pipe to change its music from good to evil. Gargamel captures the Smurfs, but Sassette saves them by telling Gargamel that she loves him. He plays the pipe but the music fades as Gargamel is overcome with feelings of love and releases the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Incredible Shrinking Wizard: Gargamel has thrown in his slime pond so much poisonous muck that the water becomes enchanted and Gargamel, after falling in, suddenly finds himself much smaller that he would wish. Actually he is going to be so small that Papa Smurf will save him!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Word: The Smurflings free the Smurfs from the clutches of Gargamel just in time to get Baby to its first word ceremony. Baby utters the word « Gargamel ». Papa Smurf says that this word indicates that Baby will one day become the Great Chief, as he is aware of the dangers in life.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy Goes On Strike: Get up early in the morning, before any other Smurf is out of bed, to prepare a scrumptious Smurfberry muffin. Spend all morning on preparing Smurf delicacies for lunch. Than all afternoon to have dinner ready – and delicious – on time. And do you get so much as a thank you form the Smurfs? So Greedy Smurf quits. The Village is in trouble... And soon, so is Greedy.

programme.title: No Time For Smurfs
programme.desc: Handy, Brainy, Clumsy, and Smurfette discover the hourglass of time in a cave and due to their bungling, time spins erratically out of control for all of the Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - For The Love Of Gargamel: Trying a new spell on the Smurfs backfires when Gargamel turns himself into stone. The Smurfs are delirious with joy. Their archenemy will make them suffer no more!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Rose: Smurfette promises Mother Nature that if she creates a blue rose Smurfette will never cut it. But when the white rose becomes blue, Smurfette becomes white. The only way to make Smurfette blue again is for her to cut the rose. She reluctantly cuts the rose, returning nature to normalcy and learning that one cannot always keep a promise.

programme.title: The Man In The Moon
programme.desc: Sick and tired of not being appreciated, the Man in the Moon quits his job and retires on Earth, to the Village of the Smurfs. The absence of a First Quarter Moon wreaks havoc in the customs of the Smurfs, and Mother Nature and Father Time get dragged in...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Fountain Of Smurf: The Smurfs discover a fountain of youth that is guarded by a wicked troll, who steals Papa Smurf's magic book. They convince Gargamel to help them and the greedy villain runs to get the water, but manages to fall in with the troll. As the two chase each other all over the countryside, the Smurfs are able to retrieve Papa Smurf's book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tis The Season To Be Smurfy: This is Wild Smurf's first Christmas, and he's impressed by the decorations in the Village of the Smurfs. But Grandpa and Sassette are going to teach him the real meaning of Christmas when they help an old couple to live the most beautiful Christmas they've ever seen...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Baby's First Word: The Smurflings free the Smurfs from the clutches of Gargamel just in time to get Baby to its first word ceremony. Baby utters the word « Gargamel ». Papa Smurf says that this word indicates that Baby will one day become the Great Chief, as he is aware of the dangers in life.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfette's Flowers: It's not every day you meet a talking flower. Especially not a character like Petaluma, a somewhat haughty bulb flower who Smurfette meets in the forest. Of course the delighted Smurfette takes Petaluma to the Village of the Smurfs... and starts a process that is going to endanger all of the Smurfs. Flowers, it seems, ought to be seen and not heard.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Squeaky: This is the dramatic, moving story of the friendship between Smurfette and her pet mouse. A sad event reduces Smurfette to tears... Can the Smurfs comfort the despairing Smurfette?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfstone Quest: In the distant valley of Nodrog, the Smurfs meet the Molians who try to dissuade them from obtaining the magical Smurf-stone that Papa Smurf needs to cure his gout.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Sky Is Smurfing: Scaredy Smurf runs into the Village screaming about the sky being about to smurf down. And just at the same moment, Papa Smurf is beset by uncontrollable fits of sneezing...

programme.title: Speak For Yourself, Farmer Smurf
programme.desc: Farmer hides his love for Smurfette by assuming a disguise and sending her poems. When they finally meet, they are captured by Bigmouth and in their struggle to get free, they discover their mutual friendship.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Journey To The Centre Of The Smurf: Winter is setting in on the Village of the Smurfs. The little Smurfs are freezing. But what is Clumsy doing with this strange rock he's discovered? And why is Miner Smurf so enthusiastic about their new discovery? Surely, one more addition to Clumsy's rock collection is not worth all this hoopla... The Smurfs will discover danger and surprises when they go underground.

programme.title: Smurf On The Run
programme.desc: Little things can sometimes bring about big effects. In trying to catch Sassette, Gargamel upsets the Balance of Truth, and from then on everybody in the world tells lies. Even Papa Smurf is changed into a pathological liar. What is more, the Spirit of the Scales chain Gargamel and Sassette to each other, and together they have to replace the Topaz of Truth....

programme.title: Alarming Smurfs
programme.desc: Feeling unwanted, the Smurflings run away. They take things to remind them of home, so the Smurfs think there's a thief in their midst. Brainy tries to catch the thief by installing smurfler alarms. The alarms cause a ruckus that draws the Smurflings home, where Papa tells them they are wanted.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Kow-Tow, We Won't Bow: Smurfette leads the Smurflings on a nature hike, but Puppy gets too far ahead and they chase him into the land of the Wartmongers. King Bullrush captures them in bubbles and imprisons them. A group of rebels rescue the Smurflings and they escape on the back of Puppy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurf On Wood: The evil wizard Gargamel once again meets Esmeralda, the gypsy fortune-teller, and she finds a novel way of getting the gold coin that Gargamel imprudently shows her. But the Smurfs in their turn are tricked into believing there is such a thing as a good-luck tree...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Smurfily Ever After: The boy from the wood and Laconia, the deaf-mute elf, ask Papa Smurf to celebrate their wedding. The Smurfs are getting the party ready, following the advice of the Smurfette, when Gargamel comes to put a spoke in their wheel.

programme.title: Foul Weather Smurf
programme.desc: Handy invents a weather machine that will allow the Smurfs to control their environment at will. Unfortunately, they cannot agree on whether it should rain or be sunny so the machine overloads and explodes.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurf Who Would Be King: Dreamy yearns to be King after reading a story about them. He falls through a whirlpool while on his ship and finds himself in the land of pokies who think Dreamy is their long-lost King. When he confronts the pokies' enemies, the Norfnags, he finds they aren't fearful at all. Dreamy bumps his head and wakes up to discover it was just a dream, yet finds a jewel in his cap, just like the ones the pokies mine for a living.

programme.title: Farmer's Genie
programme.desc: As Farmer Smurf says, what's a gourd doing in the melon patch, when it should be by the rutabagas? But when Farmer Smurf pulls the gourd out of the ground he frees a genie, which calls him Master and insists on granting him wishes. The genie, called Gourdy, is going to be more of a hindrance than a help in his eagerness to please Farmer Smurf.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sweepy Smurf: Sweepy the chimney sweep Smurf is not the most popular inhabitant of the Village of the Smurfs. He is rather messy, and the clouds of soot that he makes certainly don't add to his popularity. Only the Smurflings find him great company as he's the only one who can get dirty and not be told off. Yet in their enthusiasm for Sweepy, the Smurflings endanger the Village.

programme.title: A Bell For Azrael
programme.desc: Gargamel puts a spell on a bell attached to Azrael's tail that will lead the cat to the Smurfs. Papa Smurf outwits him with a counter-spell that leads the wizard to Big Mouth instead of the tasty Smurfs.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Prince And The Hopper: What is that strange talking frog that Morlock the Wizard sends all of Prince Theodore's soldiers to catch? Is it a demon frog, as he says, or something else? Truth will out when Smurfette and the Smurflings meet the frog. They help to change this frog back into Prince Theodore himself, for he's been the victim of a spell cast by Morlock.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Littlest Viking: The Smurfs take Grandpa Smurf to the King's castle so that he can meet Peewit. But what with one thing and another (especially another), the Smurfs and Peewit are taken aboard a Viking long ship. The Vikings take Peewit to be their mythical Great Warrior, the one who is going to vanquish the Storm King. Can the Smurfs help Peewit out of his quandary?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lure Of The Orb: Allura the Enchantress possesses a very special magic orb whose energy, as she says, can lift spirits and inspire the uninspired! All you have to do is hold the orb between your hands... It is true the orb bestows inspiration, up to a point. But its side effects can be very dangerous, as the Smurfs find out when they become addicted to it...

programme.title: Jokey's Joke Book
programme.desc: Jokey Smurf's joke boxes are no longer funny to the other Smurfs. Jokey finds new ideas in his Great Joke Book, but these ideas are even less popular in the Village. And here comes the evil Gargamel with a few jokes of his own...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Little Smurf Confidence: Papa Smurf gives Weakling a special cream to wear that will restore his strength. Shortly after, he is awarded for his daring deeds of strength and his confidence really soars when he realizes the cream is smurfberry jam.

programme.title: Brainy Smurf, Friend To All Animals
programme.desc: Brainy dons his safari hat and roams the forest to do good deeds for animals. He mostly gives advice to the creatures but balks when he can really save the life of a wildcat being hunted by Gargamel. Nat gives Brainy the courage to free the cat from Gargamel's trap.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy And The Porridge Pot: The good fairy, Guinilda gives Greedy a magic porridge pot that Brainy causes to overflow into the village and forest. The good-hearted fairy hurries to the rescue and then asks for the pot back to give to an orphanage of hungry children.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Smurfs' Christmas: The Smurfs come to the rescue of two children and their grandfather when a mysterious stranger appears and causes their sleigh to crash. Knocking on Gargamel's door for help puts them and the Smurfs in danger…

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve
programme.desc: After pulling off their Las Vegas casino heist, Danny Ocean incurs the wrath of Terry Benedict, who wants his money back with interest. Lacking the cash to meet his two-week deadline, the crew of thieves must plan an elaborate robbery in Europe, or their lives will be forfeit. While they have Danny's wife on their side, they face a new challenge in the form of the mysterious 'Night Fox', who seems to be the better thief.

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Based on a real-life incident. The commander of Russia's first nuclear submarine and his executive officer's first test voyage ends in disaster when the reactor fails. The only hope is for the crew to repair it at the risk of fatal irradiation, but the two men also have very different political agendas, one of which could trigger global conflict rather than maintain the uneasy truce of the Cold War.

programme.title: Nightcrawler
programme.desc: Louis Bloom finds himself falling head first in to the shady world of crime journalism. He quickly develops a taste for the profession and discovers that he has got both the business acumen and a strong enough stomach to fend off his rivals.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plans to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take, mall-time drug lords, sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill. For police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: Chen Yutong, a girl's middle school student, was bullied at school, but her mother Li Han was unable to save her daughter from the "hell." Everyone around her turned a blind eye, and a collective silence brewed greater violence.

programme.title: Gloria
programme.desc: The mob eliminates Jack Dawn and his family. His six year old son, Phil, escapes with Gloria, the girlfriend of one of the gangsters, but they are chased because of a book containing mop accounts.

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: Following the journey of Vanessa, a grief-stricken woman who mysteriously finds herself navigating between parallel spaces.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Nightcrawler

programme.desc: A man and his teenage daughter realise they're at the centre of a dark and sinister event while watching a concert.

programme.desc: A London cocaine dealer wants to retire with his millions and his health intact, but mob boss Price has other ideas, dragging him into a set-up involving a missing junkie, a million stolen tablets of `E' and an East European hitman.

programme.desc: After escaping prison, Kat's own revolver is pointed to his head by an unknown assailant. As the empty rounds click away, he tries to remember what happened to each bullet.

programme.desc: An assassin on his last assignment travels to Fuerteventura to kill a man he's never met.

programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his family's ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.desc: When a struggling single mother befriends a mysterious woman who has supernatural powers, she sees a lucrative opportunity to make some fast cash. However, their crime spree soon draws unwanted attention as the cops start to close in.

programme.title: Maggie Moore(s)
programme.desc: Police Chief Sanders unravels a web of small-town lies while investigating the bizarre murders of two women with the same name. He meets and quickly falls for Rita, a nosy neighbour who's eager to help solve the mystery.

programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one another's loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.

However, after a casual fling with a sultry book editor named Alex, everything changes. Jilted by Dan, Alex becomes unstable, her behaviour escalating from aggressive pursuit to obsessive stalking. Dan realises that his main problem is not hiding his affair, but rather saving himself and his family.

Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

programme.title: Live: The Paul Finebaum Show
programme.desc: Veteran writer, reporter and radio personality Paul Finebaum built a legion of loyal sports fans as the "Voice of the SEC" during 20 years hosting his Birmingham, Ala.-based radio talk show. When ESPN launched the SEC Network in 2014, it was only natural that Finebaum became its first on-air hire, bringing his radio show -- and those passionate followers -- with him. Now originating from one of the SEC Network studios in Charlotte, N.C., the show is a forum for lively discussion and debate of all things SEC and across the spectrum of college sports, with Finebaum playing the role of both moderator and provocateur. The show airs weekday afternoons throughout the year on SEC Network.

programme.desc: Ben Shephard hosts the quiz in which contestants answer questions to win turns on an arcade-style machine. programme.title: Pitch Invaders
programme.desc: Anna Mowbray and Ali Williams work with billionaire Bill Foley to launch an Auckland football team in the A-League. In just 10 months, they must build, recruit, and train a squad.

programme.title: This One's For Alex
programme.desc: Alex Paulsen's controversial switch to Auckland FC has everyone talking. Now, he faces his former club in the first-ever New Zealand Derby - a match overflowing with rivalry and emotion.

programme.title: How Long Can This Go On?
programme.desc: Riding a wave of success, Auckland FC proves that they're the real deal. However, the squad faces a new challenge when a string of injuries sidelines some key players.

programme.title: The Gaffer
programme.desc: After nearly two decades at Sydney FC, Steve Corica was shown the door. Now at the helm of Auckland FC, Corica faces the daunting task of leading his new squad against his former club.

programme.title: What We Do For Football
programme.desc: Kiwi Francis De Vries surprises everyone with his talent and shares the tough realities of professional football. As they climb the A-League ladder, Auckland FC prepares for some crucial games.

programme.title: New Kids On The Pitch
programme.desc: With the third and final clash against the Phoenix looming, pressure mounts on Auckland FC to make it a clean sweep. Meanwhile, homegrown AFC players look to inspire the next generation.

programme.title: The End Is Near
programme.desc: As the season nears its final stretch, Alex Paulsen's departure raises major questions over the club's future. With AFC's star goalkeeper on his way out, all eyes turn to Michael Woud.

programme.title: We Go Again
programme.desc: AFC secures the Premiers Plate, making history with a record-breaking debut season. With silverware in the cabinet, the pressure intensifies as attention shifts to the Championship.

programme.desc: Are you making the most of your Medicare coverage? In this program you will learn about the variety of Humana Medicare plans designed to fit your needs, your lifestyle, and your budget.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: The snoring Stooges are awakened near midday by their wives, who demand they find jobs; they become snake-oil salesmen and invade a hospital.

programme.title: The Dead Zone
programme.desc: When Johnny Smith (Christopher Walken) awakens from a coma caused by a car accident, he finds that years have passed, and he now has psychic abilities. Heartbroken that his girlfriend (Brooke Adams) has moved on with her life, Johnny also must contend with his unsettling powers, which allow him to see a person's future with a mere touch. After shaking the hand of aspiring politician Greg Stillson (Martin Sheen), Johnny sees the danger presented by the candidate's rise and resolves to kill him.

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After leaving their prom early, innocent Jenny (Renée Zellweger) and three other teenagers crash their car in the backwoods of Texas. In their search for help, they run into Vilmer Slaughter (Matthew McConaughey), a vicious psychopath with a mechanical leg, and his twisted family, including the serial killer Leatherface. As the group of friends struggle to survive the maniacal methods of torture, Jenny discovers the secret origins behind the family's lust for blood.

programme.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
programme.desc: Chrissie (Jordana Brewster) and her friends (Matthew Bomer, Taylor Handley, Diora Baird) set out on a road trip for a final fling before one is shipped off to Vietnam. Along the way, bikers (Lee Tergesen, Cyia Batten) harass the foursome and cause an accident that throws Chrissie from the vehicle. The lawman who arrives on the scene kills one of the bikers and brings Chrissie's friends to the Hewitt homestead, where young Leatherface (Andrew Bryniarski) is learning the tools of terror.

programme.title: Ghost Ship
programme.desc: In a remote region of the Bering Sea, a boat salvage crew discovers the eerie remains of a grand passenger liner thought lost for more than 40 years. But once onboard the eerie, cavernous ship, the crew of the Arctic Warrior discovers that the decaying vessel is anything but deserted. It's home to something more deadly and horrific than anything they've encountered in all their years at sea.

programme.title: Trick 'r Treat
programme.desc: Interwoven stories demonstrate that some traditions are best not forgotten as the residents (Anna Paquin, Brian Cox, Dylan Baker) of a small town face real ghosts and goblins on Halloween. Tales of terror reveal the consequences of extinguishing a Jack-o-Lantern before midnight and a grumpy hermit's encounter with a sinister trick-or-treater.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of an old abandoned church, Trish (Gina Philips) and her brother Darry (Justin Long) watch their routine road trip home from college turn into a heart-stopping race for their lives. They find themselves the chosen prey of an indestructible force that relentlessly pursues them and gives a new and chilling meaning to the old song "Jeepers Creepers.".

programme.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer
programme.desc: A year after running over a fisherman and dumping his body in the water, four friends reconvene when Julie (Jennifer Love Hewitt) receives a frightening letter telling her that their crime was seen. While pursuing who he thinks is responsible for the letter, Barry (Ryan Phillippe) is run over by a man with a meat hook. The bloodletting only increases from there, as the killer with the hook continues to stalk Julie, Helen (Sarah Michelle Gellar) and Ray (Freddie Prinze Jr.).

programme.title: House of Wax
programme.desc: A gang of college friends, including Wade (Jared Padalecki) and his girlfriend, Carly (Elisha Cuthbert), are en route to a school football game when they wind up with a flat tire in a ghost town. They are forced to seek help in the only place that's open: the local wax museum. Once inside the spooky and seemingly abandoned building, they find the works on display are not quite what they seem -- and the group soon discovers it's being hunted by the insane twin brothers who run the museum.

programme.title: Insidious: The Last Key
programme.desc: Brilliant parapsychologist Elise Rainier receives a disturbing phone call from a man who claims that his house is haunted. Even more disturbing is the address -- 413 Apple Tree Lane in Five Keys, N.M. -- the home where Elise grew up as a child. Accompanied by her two investigative partners, Rainier travels to Five Keys to confront and destroy her greatest fear -- the demon that she accidentally set free years earlier.

programme.title: The Creation of the Humanoids
programme.desc: When nuclear war annihilates much of the world's population, the remaining humans come to rely heavily on robotic androids to keep their fragile society afloat. Over time the androids become so alarmingly lifelike and sophisticated that Kenneth Cragis (Don Megowan) of the Order of Flesh and Blood advocates banning them. When the first-ever murder of a human by a robot occurs, many rally to Cragis' cause until it's discovered that his sister (Frances McCann) has become intimate with a robot.

programme.title: War of the Colossal Beast
programme.desc: After a series of delivery trucks are robbed and destroyed south of the border, Joyce Manning (Sally Fraser) fears her brother, Lt. Col. Glenn Manning (Dean Parkin), is the culprit. Manning is a gigantic behemoth, a victim of overexposure to radiation who has gone insane due to his freakish size. The giant is eventually apprehended by the Army and held captive. But the frenzied beast is too much for his captors and soon breaks out, intent on laying waste to Los Angeles.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: The Stooges become doctors at a large hospital, where they disrupt patients and staff alike.

programme.title: Freedom to Leave the House! Inogen Portable Oxygen
programme.desc: Regain independence and enjoy greater mobility with the compact design and long-lasting battery of portable oxygen.

programme.desc: Are you making the most of your Medicare coverage? In this program you will learn about the variety of Humana Medicare plans designed to fit your needs, your lifestyle, and your budget.

programme.title: Overwhelmed with IRS Debt? Keys to Resolving Tax Debt
programme.desc: See how one company is changing people's lives by helping them put their tax problems to rest.

programme.desc: Are you making the most of your Medicare coverage? In this program you will learn about the variety of Humana Medicare plans designed to fit your needs, your lifestyle, and your budget.

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn what's behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQ's Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: The Possession
programme.desc: When their youngest daughter, Em (Natasha Calis), becomes strangely obsessed with an antique wooden box bought from a yard sale, parents Clyde (Jeffrey Dean Morgan) and Stephanie (Kyra Sedgwick) see little cause for alarm. However, Em becomes increasingly unstable, leading the couple to fear the presence of a malevolent force. To their horror, Clyde and Stephanie learn that the box contains a dybbuk, a dislocated spirit that inhabits -- and ultimately devours -- a human host.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson) becomes winter caretaker at the isolated Overlook Hotel in Colorado, hoping to cure his writer's block. He settles in along with his wife, Wendy (Shelley Duvall), and his son, Danny (Danny Lloyd), who is plagued by psychic premonitions. As Jack's writing goes nowhere and Danny's visions become more disturbing, Jack discovers the hotel's dark secrets and begins to unravel into a homicidal maniac hell-bent on terrorizing his family.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: In this chilling adaptation of Stephen King's horror novel, withdrawn and sensitive teen Carrie White (Sissy Spacek) faces taunting from classmates at school and abuse from her fanatically pious mother (Piper Laurie) at home. When strange occurrences start happening around Carrie, she begins to suspect that she has supernatural powers. Invited to the prom by the empathetic Tommy Ross (William Katt), Carrie tries to let her guard down, but things eventually take a dark and violent turn.

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: American diplomat Robert (Gregory Peck) adopts Damien (Harvey Stephens) when his wife, Katherine (Lee Remick), delivers a stillborn child. After Damien's first nanny hangs herself, Father Brennan (Patrick Troughton) warns Robert that Damien will kill Katherine's unborn child. Shortly thereafter, Brennan dies and Katherine miscarries when Damien pushes her off a balcony. As more people around Damien die, Robert investigates Damien's background and realizes his adopted son may be the Antichrist.

programme.title: The Omen
programme.desc: A new age of evil threatens to arise when an American diplomat (Liev Schreiber) and his wife (Julia Stiles) learn that the child (Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick) they adopted may be the son of Satan. Mystical signs point to the Antichrist's coming battle for dominion over heaven and Earth.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: High school can be tough for many teenagers, but for Carrie White (Chloë Grace Moretz), it's especially hellish. A shy and awkward teen being raised by a religious zealot (Julianne Moore), Carrie is frequently the target of bullies. But Carrie has a secret talent: She can make things move with her mind. One fateful night, an especially cruel prank at her senior prom pushes her over the edge, and Carrie unleashes her telekinetic powers on all who get in her way.

programme.title: The Crazies
programme.desc: Anarchy reigns when an unknown toxin turns the peaceful citizens of Ogden Marsh into bloodthirsty lunatics. In an effort to contain the spread of the infection, authorities blockade the town and use deadly force to keep anyone from getting in or out. Now trapped among killers, Sheriff Dutten (Timothy Olyphant) and his wife (Radha Mitchell) and two companions must band together to find a way out before madness and death overtake them.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A group of misguided animal rights activists free a caged chimp infected with the "Rage" virus from a medical research lab. When London bike courier Jim (Cillian Murphy) wakes up from a coma a month after, he finds his city all but deserted. On the run from the zombie-like victims of the Rage, Jim stumbles upon a group of survivors, including Selena (Naomie Harris) and cab driver Frank (Brendan Gleeson), and joins them on a perilous journey to what he hopes will be safety.

programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: Skeptical graduate student Helen Lyle (Virginia Madsen) befriends Anne-Marie McCoy (Vanessa Williams) while researching superstitions in a housing project on Chicago's Near North Side. From Anne-Marie, Helen learns about the Candyman (Tony Todd), a knife-wielding figure of urban legend that some of her neighbors believe to be responsible for a recent murder. After a mysterious man matching the Candyman's description begins stalking her, Helen comes to fear that the legend may be all too real.

programme.title: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday
programme.desc: After being blown away by a team of FBI agents, Jason Voorhees (Kane Hodder) needs to find a way to overcome certain death. When his bloodied remains are sent to the morgue, his heart, still intact, is able to hypnotize a coroner and take over his body. After brutally dispatching a couple of FBI agents, he heads back to his favorite stomping grounds: Crystal Lake. Jason commences another teen massacre while a bounty hunter (Steven Williams) discovers the only way to kill him.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VIII: Jason Takes Manhattan
programme.desc: Mass murderer Jason Voorhees (Kane Hodder) is resurrected from the bottom of Crystal Lake. After he kills a passing boat's occupants, he stows away on a cruise ship filled with a high-school graduating class bound for New York City. Biology teacher Charles McCulloch (Peter Mark Richman) is on board with his niece, Rennie (Jensen Daggett), who has visions of Jason drowning as a child. They escape his bloody shipboard rampage, but, when Rennie and Charles reach Manhattan, Jason is close by.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives
programme.desc: Years ago, Tommy Jarvis (Thom Mathews) killed infamous hockey-masked murderer Jason Voorhees (C.J. Graham), and the intensity of the experience has landed him in a mental institution. To end his torment and achieve a level of closure, Tommy escapes from the hospital and heads to the graveyard where Jason is buried, intending to dig up the body and cremate it. But, before this total annihilation can occur, a freak electrical accident resurrects Jason from the dead, and the terror begins anew.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part VII -- The New Blood
programme.desc: Years after the strange drowning death of her father, Tina Shepard (Lar Park Lincoln) returns to the site of his demise, Crystal Lake. Her developing psychic powers were responsible for ending his life, leaving Tina riddled with guilt as an adult. While deceitful Dr. Crews (Terry Kiser) tries to manipulate her abilities for his own ends, both physician and patient are in for a shock when Tina's powers unwittingly free camper-killer Jason Voorhees from his watery slumber.

programme.title: Freddy vs. Jason
programme.desc: Two horror icons face off in this supernatural movie. Disfigured serial killer Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund), who attacks his victims in their dreams, has lost much of his power since citizens of his town have become less afraid of him. Enlisting the help of fellow violent murderer Jason Voorhees (Ken Kirzinger), Freddy orchestrates a new killing spree. However, when the hockey-mask-wearing psychopath won't stop chopping up Freddy's intended victims, the two ghouls start to battle each other.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Crystal Lake's history of murder doesn't deter counselors from setting up a summer camp in the woodsy area. Superstitious locals warn against it, but the fresh-faced young people -- Jack (Kevin Bacon), Alice (Adrienne King), Bill (Harry Crosby), Marcie (Jeannine Taylor) and Ned (Mark Nelson) -- pay little heed to the old-timers. Then they find themselves stalked by a brutal killer. As they're slashed, shot and stabbed, the counselors struggle to stay alive against a merciless opponent.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part 2
programme.desc: The second entry in the long-running horror series focuses on a group of teenage would-be counselors converging on Camp Crystal Lake for training under the tutelage of head counselor Paul (John Furey). Inevitably, Paul relates the story of Jason Voorhees (Warrington Gillette), a boy who ostensibly drowned at the camp and whose mother murdered a group of counselors in revenge. No one takes the tale seriously until a very much alive Jason begins gruesomely eliminating people.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a man's naked body is found at the centre of a crop circle and more corpses begin turning up with peculiar injuries, DCI Barnaby has to uncover who is responsible - or are extraterrestrial powers really at work in Midsomer?

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The disappearance of a villager brings DCI Tom Barnaby face to face with old adversary Melvyn Stockard, now reinvented as the local squire. When a body is pulled out of a well, Barnaby is convinced Stockard is somehow involved.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a village postman is brutally murdered, DCI Barnaby uncovers a hotbed of adultery within the remote hamlet of Goodman's Land. As more murders rock the community, WPC Nash attempts to untangle the web of sexual liaisons in a bid to catch the killer.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: An accident during the restoration of a canal leads to a particularly difficult case for Barnaby and Troy, which appears to be linked to a group of rowdy teenagers.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Sergeant Dan Scott arrives to work with Barnaby and is thrown straight into a murder investigation in Midsomer Mallow. A noise heard near the scene of Fiona Thompson's bloodstained body leads police to suspect an odd-job man, but when the murder toll rises, Barnaby becomes concerned for Cully, who is organising a ten-year school reunion.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Womanising landowner Gareth Heldman is killed by a violent blow from a Celtic spear, reawakening memories of a tragic archaeological dig at the ancient mound of Midsomer Barrow.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a prize-winning author is murdered on the eve of a literary festival, Barnaby and Scott discover a hotbed of corruption, scandal and financial mismanagement in the community of Midsomer St Michael. Before they can discover who is telling the truth, the death toll begins to rise.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When a young barman from The Maid in Splendour pub is found shot dead, Barnaby and Scott uncover a web of romantic intrigue involving several members of the bar staff.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The revival of a traditional festival at Midsomer Parva ends in tragedy when the curate, the Rev Alex Dakin, is burnt alive inside a straw effigy of a woman. Then his gay lover the priest, the Rev Jim Hale, dies too.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: It's Christmas and the troubled Villiers family get together nine years after the death of eldest son Ferdy, a magician. A riddle in a cracker predicts that two people will die before midnight on Boxing Day, then the frail Lydia Villiers is hospitalised after a fall. As Barnaby abandons his Christmas lunch with the in-laws to investigate, it seems as though ghosts from the past are haunting the household.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the body of a young man is found in a WWII-era motor car full of exhaust fumes, it looks like suicide. However, Simon Bright was not alone - as he was hit on the head before he died. Where is his girlfriend, newcomer Laura Sharp? What is her hold on the people of Morton Fendle, a village still overshadowed by the gloomy spectre of the war?

Arthur wears two masks -- the one he paints for his day job as a clown, and the guise he projects in a futile attempt to feel like he's part of the world around him. Isolated, bullied and disregarded by society, Fleck begins a slow descent into madness as he transforms into the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

Jackson) launches a diabolical plan to solve the problem of climate change via a worldwide killing spree.

programme.desc: When a Chinese diplomat's daughter is kidnapped in Los Angeles, he calls in Hong Kong Detective Inspector Lee (Jackie Chan) to assist the FBI with the case. Although Lee and Carter can't stand each other, they choose to work together to solve the case on their own when they figure out they've been ditched by both the FBI and police.

Learning that she lives in the gang's neighborhood, Doug seeks her out to discover what she knows, and he falls in love. programme.desc: When Rocky Kitty runs away and tries to join the "PAW Patrol," he helps the pups rescue Humdinger and the kitties from a hang-glider ride; when the Good Neighbor Robots confuse Farmer Al's request, they wind up being the target of a hungry eagle.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble gets into trouble while pretending to be a super pup; the PAW Patrol must help Ryder find his robot pup.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The pups fly to the Arctic in order to rescue lost polar bear cubs; the Patrol needs to find lost sheep and learn who has been making holes in a fence.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder investigates when jets of water start springing up all over town; the Paw Patrol helps a rancher find a spooked horse.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al get stuck in the Haunted Maze; it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the farmers and solve this mystery.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Cap'n Turbot stumbles into a secret cavern that was once a pirate's hideout; the PAW Patrol searches for clues to find the missing pieces of a treasure map.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Jake and Everest are excited for the snowboard competition, but the course is buried under snow; the PAW Patrol sets out to retrieve Cap'n Turbot's sunken diving bell.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Yumi's crops begin to sprout huge vegetables, the PAW Patrol must corral the stampeding produce; the pups draw a message for space aliens on Farmer Al's field.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Boomer challenges Roxi in a race to the top of a mountain, his reckless driving causes an avalanche of boulders.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al get stuck in the Haunted Maze; it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the farmers and solve this mystery.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Storm claims that she's scared of nothing, so Jokey tries to prove her wrong; Hefty's shadow comes to life and rebels because it wants to be free to do whatever it wants.

programme.title: Sonic Prime
programme.desc: To save Captain Dread's crew and recapture the Shard, Sonic will have to act fast; luckily, he has help from an unexpected ally.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Members of the mysterious and spooky Addams family -- Gomez, Morticia, Pugsley, Wednesday, Uncle Fester and Grandma -- are readily preparing for a visit from their even creepier relatives. But trouble soon arises when shady TV personality Margaux Needler realizes that the Addams' eerie mansion is standing in the way of her dream to sell all the houses in the neighborhood.

programme.title: The Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Family Fun Night turns into Baby Work Night when trouble follows the Templetons to the grand opening of a seemingly purr-fect restaurant.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob and Patrick must track down Old Man Jenkins' prized worm hog.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Quasar uses Patrick to communicate with Aliens; Patrick and GrandPat have a contest about staring off.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: The Chum Bucket is replaced by a flower shop with a charming new owner; the Krusty Krab enters a float in the annual Bikini Bottom Parade.

programme.title: The Secret Life of Pets 2
programme.desc: Explore the emotional lives of pets and the deep bond between them and the families that love them as Max, Gidget, Snowball and the rest of the gang take on new adventures and push themselves to find the courage to become their own heroes.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Evolving from single-celled yellow organisms at the dawn of time, Minions live to serve, but find themselves working for a continual series of unsuccessful masters, from T. Rex to Napoleon. Without a master to grovel for, the Minions fall into a deep depression. But one minion, Kevin, has a plan; accompanied by his pals Stuart and Bob, Kevin sets forth to find a new evil boss for his brethren to follow. Their search leads them to Scarlet Overkill, the world's first-ever super-villainess.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy realizes she has feelings for Penny's ex; Koothrappali and Wolowitz try to prove who would be a better superhero.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard's idea for a smartphone application causes friction in his friendship with Sheldon.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadette runs into her ex-boyfriend (Rick Fox) while attending a science event with Wolowitz.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon takes acting lessons from Penny in hope of becoming a better teacher; Koothrappali fantasizes about his friend's girlfriend.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. programme.title: The Rage: Carrie 2
programme.desc: When her closest friend commits suicide after being manipulated by the popular crowd, quiet and bookish Rachel Lang (Emily Bergl) decides to get back at the guilty parties. Although Rachel falls for sensitive football player Jesse Ryan (Jason London), she remains determined to punish his callous friends. When Rachel discovers that she has superhuman abilities, it ups the stakes for her revenge, echoing a supernatural incident that occurred decades before.

programme.title: Stillwater
programme.desc: An American oil-rig roughneck travels to Marseille, France, to visit his estranged daughter, in prison for a murder she claims she didn't commit. Confronted with language barriers, cultural differences and a complicated legal system, he soon builds a new life for himself as he makes it his personal mission to exonerate her.

programme.title: The Quiet Ones
programme.desc: An unorthodox college professor leads his best students off the grid to perform a dangerous experiment to create a poltergeist. Operating under the theory that paranormal activity is triggered by negative human energy, the group uses a series of tests to push a young woman to the edge of sanity. Frightening occurrences with unspeakable consequences subsequently unfold, leading the researchers to the realization that they have unleashed a force more terrifying than they could have imagined.

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: Kate Mandell takes a job as a nanny for two young orphans at an isolated Gothic mansion in the Maine countryside. She soon learns that the children -- Miles and Flora -- are emotionally distant and unstable. When strange events start to plague Kate and the siblings, she begins to suspect that the estate's dark corridors are home to a malevolent entity.

programme.title: You're Next
programme.desc: The Davisons, an upper-class family, are extremely wealthy -- but also estranged. In an attempt to mend their broken family ties, Aubrey (Barbara Crampton) and Paul (Rob Moran) Davison decide to celebrate their wedding anniversary by inviting their four children and their children's significant others to their weekend estate. The celebration gets off to a rocky start, but when crossbow-wielding assailants in animal masks suddenly attack, the Davisons must pull together or die.

programme.title: Once Bitten
programme.desc: A centuries-old vampire, the countess (Lauren Hutton) has kept her youthful look by drinking the blood of male virgins. Since she finds this prey challenging to come by, she is thrilled when she meets young Mark Kendall (Jim Carrey), who wants to lose his virginity, yet has a reluctant girlfriend, Robin (Karen Kopins). After luring Mark away from a club, the countess drinks his blood, but the hapless guy isn't sure what has happened until he starts exhibiting unusual symptoms.

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: David Dunn tries to stay one step ahead of the law while delivering vigilante justice on the streets of Philadelphia. His special talents soon put him on a collision course with the Beast -- the psychotic madman who has superhuman strength and 23 distinct personalities. Their epic showdown leads them to an encounter with the mysterious Elijah Price, the criminal mastermind who holds critical secrets for both men.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 3
programme.desc: A sergeant and his task force embark on a mission to destroy the Creeper on its last day of feeding. The Creeper soon fights back when they get close to discovering its mysterious and dark origins.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: M3GAN is a marvel of artificial intelligence, a lifelike doll that's programmed to be a child's greatest companion and a parent's greatest ally. Designed by Gemma, a brilliant roboticist, M3GAN can listen, watch and learn as it plays the role of friend and teacher, playmate and protector. When Gemma becomes the unexpected caretaker of her 8-year-old niece, she decides to give the girl a M3GAN prototype, a decision that leads to unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers 3
programme.desc: A sergeant and his task force embark on a mission to destroy the Creeper on its last day of feeding. The Creeper soon fights back when they get close to discovering its mysterious and dark origins.

programme.title: You're Next
programme.desc: The Davisons, an upper-class family, are extremely wealthy -- but also estranged. In an attempt to mend their broken family ties, Aubrey (Barbara Crampton) and Paul (Rob Moran) Davison decide to celebrate their wedding anniversary by inviting their four children and their children's significant others to their weekend estate. The celebration gets off to a rocky start, but when crossbow-wielding assailants in animal masks suddenly attack, the Davisons must pull together or die.

programme.title: The Quiet Ones
programme.desc: An unorthodox college professor leads his best students off the grid to perform a dangerous experiment to create a poltergeist. Operating under the theory that paranormal activity is triggered by negative human energy, the group uses a series of tests to push a young woman to the edge of sanity. Frightening occurrences with unspeakable consequences subsequently unfold, leading the researchers to the realization that they have unleashed a force more terrifying than they could have imagined.

programme.title: Wolf
programme.desc: Believing he's a wolf trapped in a man's body, Jacob eats, sleeps and lives like one -- much to the shock of his family. When he's sent to a clinic, Jacob and his animal-bound peers are forced to undergo increasingly extreme forms of curative therapies. However, once he meets the mysterious Wildcat, their friendship blossoms into an undeniable infatuation, and Jacob must decide whether to renounce his true self for love.

programme.title: Leatherface
programme.desc: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Twelve strangers wake up in a clearing. They don't know where they are, or how they got there. In the shadow of a dark internet conspiracy theory, ruthless elitists gather at a remote location to hunt humans for sport. But their master plan is about to be derailed when one of the hunted, Crystal, turns the tables on her pursuers.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorize his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Halloween Ends
programme.desc: Four years after her last encounter with masked killer Michael Myers, Laurie Strode is living with her granddaughter and trying to finish her memoir. Myers hasn't been seen since, and Laurie finally decides to liberate herself from rage and fear and embrace life. However, when a young man stands accused of killing a boy that he was babysitting, it ignites a cascade of violence and terror that forces Laurie to confront the evil she can't control.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: M3GAN is a marvel of artificial intelligence, a lifelike doll that's programmed to be a child's greatest companion and a parent's greatest ally. Designed by Gemma, a brilliant roboticist, M3GAN can listen, watch and learn as it plays the role of friend and teacher, playmate and protector. When Gemma becomes the unexpected caretaker of her 8-year-old niece, she decides to give the girl a M3GAN prototype, a decision that leads to unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney Shaw is a shy but clever 13-year-old boy who's being held in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims -- and they are dead set on making sure that what happened to them doesn't happen to Finney.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorize his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Halloween Ends

However, when a young man stands accused of killing a boy that he was babysitting, it ignites a cascade of violence and terror that forces Laurie to confront the evil she can't control.

programme.title: Blackwater Lane
programme.desc: Late one night a woman drives by a stranded motorist who is later revealed to have been murdered. After a series of terrifying events the woman believes she is the killer's next victim.

programme.title: Leatherface
programme.desc: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

programme.title: The Prodigy
programme.desc: Sarah and John Blume are thrilled when their young son Miles starts to show signs of rapid development and extreme intelligence. Their family bliss soon turns into a living nightmare when Miles' behavior becomes increasingly erratic and violent by his eighth birthday. After seeking help from two experts, Sarah is horrified to learn that her beloved prodigy may be under the grip of a dark and supernatural force.

programme.title: Blackwater Lane
programme.desc: Late one night a woman drives by a stranded motorist who is later revealed to have been murdered. After a series of terrifying events the woman believes she is the killer's next victim.

programme.title: Clara's Ghost
programme.desc: Clara, fed up with the constant ribbing from her self-absorbed showbiz family, finds guidance from the supernatural force she believes is haunting her.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: Upset about moving from the big city to a small town, young Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) finds a silver lining when he meets his beautiful neighbor Hannah (Odeya Rush). The teen is surprised to learn that Hannah's mysterious father is R.L. Stine (Jack Black), the famous author of the best-selling "Goosebumps" series. When Zach accidentally unleashes the monsters from the fantastic tales, it's up to Stine, his daughter and Cooper to return the beasts back to the books where they belong.

programme.title: The Black Phone
programme.desc: Finney Shaw is a shy but clever 13-year-old boy who's being held in a soundproof basement by a sadistic, masked killer. When a disconnected phone on the wall starts to ring, he soon discovers that he can hear the voices of the murderer's previous victims -- and they are dead set on making sure that what happened to them doesn't happen to Finney.

programme.title: Knock at the Cabin
programme.desc: While vacationing at a remote cabin in the woods, a young girl and her parents are taken hostage by four armed strangers who demand they make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse. Confused, scared and with limited access to the outside world, the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: One night per year, the government sanctions a 12-hour period in which citizens can commit any crime they wish -- including murder -- without fear of punishment or imprisonment. Leo, a sergeant who lost his son, plans a vigilante mission of revenge during the mayhem. However, instead of a death-dealing avenger, he becomes the unexpected protector of four innocent strangers who desperately need his help if they are to survive the night.
